nodes.bodyText: Is this for a single component (attribute) or does it provide a view over several components? Could clarify that in the comment.

nodes.bodyText: This calculation should be moved to a common place and also used in AttributeInitializer::get_transient_memory_usage().

Consider extending comment to include that it is also sampling transient memory usage and that sampling happens across multiple attributes. Also include that it is not only the filter that is updated upon destruction.
Also consider adding unit test for this class.
Consider adding metric that exposes the transient memory usage in ResourceUsageMetrics.
